titleStmt.title: Urim and Thummim. Light and truth. / Being the two last sermons preached by Mr. John Guthry, July 17. 1669, in reference to indulgence.
titleStmt.author: Guthrie, John, 1632-1669.

notesStmt.note: Concerning maxims of Christian life; published shortly before Guthrie's execution.
Dated on known evidence of John Guthrie's execution in 1669.
Imperfect: print fade with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
